page.title: 03ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: In our 4 by 3 D block we have a wide range of entertainment like the Y.M.C.A. which holds roller skating ,arcade games ,food bar ,judo ,ballet lessons and many more activities. We also have a cinema on Birley Street that shows certificate U,PG and X films and a matinee on Saturday. We have a Scout and Cub troop called 2nd Kirkham St.Michael's the cubs meet on Tuesday 6:30pm until 8:00pm.The scouts meet on Wednesday 7:00pm until 9:00pm. We also have a football team called Kirkham juniors.They started in 1975 with one team.Since then they have grown to ten teams.
